subject: Medicine
title: The Placebo Paradox in Research
description: Learn The Placebo Paradox in Research in one minute.

hook.text: Placebos are meant to be the baseline, not the competitor.

buildup.text: But placebo responses keep getting stronger in modern trials.

discovery.text: American trials show bigger placebo effects than European ones.

twist.text: Longer trials and more patient contact boost the effect.

climax.text: Researchers now study the placebo itself as a treatment.

punchline.text: The control group became the subject.

quiz.question: Why are placebo responses growing in clinical trials?
options: Longer trials and more patient contact boost them
